p: We are looking for a strong MSSQL developer to join a small team in Piscataway, NJ.
p.1: Must be strong in developing stored procedures and triggers. Must have strong knowledge of SSIS, SSRS, SSAS and SSMS. MySQL is a nice to have but not required. Front-end development such as PHP is also a nice to have. Absolutely no remote, must be able to work from our Piscataway office 5 days a week.
